function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Promotion of unproven and potentially unsafe treatments for COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of harm to individuals, false sense of security, delays in seeking appropriate treatment","Mitigation":"Promote evidence-based treatments, educate the public on the risks of unproven treatments, regulate promotion of pharmaceuticals","Technologies":"Regulatory frameworks, public health campaigns, evidence-based medicine guidelines","People":"General public, patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Misinformation and confusion about the efficacy of drugs for COVID-19 treatment","Impact":"Uncertainty about effective treatments, potential misuse of medications, distrust in healthcare recommendations","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accurate information on drug efficacy, monitor and correct misinformation, promote transparency in clinical trials and research","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, fact-checking tools, data monitoring and analysis systems","People":"General public, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Delayed development and evaluation of safe and effective treatments","Impact":"Lack of timely access to effective therapies, prolonged impact of the pandemic, increased burden on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development, streamline regulatory processes, promote collaboration and data sharing among researchers","Technologies":"Clinical research platforms, data sharing infrastructure, research funding mechanisms","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, government funding agencies"}]}
